Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label a fish in its natural water environment.
The student can illustrate and label the resources the fish needs to survive, such as water.
The student can show with labels how the fish uses its environment to meet its needs, like swimming in water.
The student can show and label other living things that might share the water environment with the fish.
The student can illustrate and describe how the environment of the fish and its needs are part of a working system.
